document.full_text: from keith richards' assertion that he really did snort his father's ashes to sammy hagar's revelation that he's been abducted by aliens, out-there autobiographies by aging rock stars are helping to fuel the ailing book-publishing business.
document.title: how rock music is saving books
lines_and_colors: from keith richards' assertion that he really did snort his father's ashes to sammy hagar's revelation that he's been abducted by aliens, out-there autobiographies by aging rock stars are helping to fuel the ailing book-publishing business.
